p: Subsequently, we docked major phytoconstituents identified by GC-MS analysis ( Figure 3) into the homology model of α-glucosidase. The binding energy data of the docked compounds is shown in Table 9. The binding energy of these compounds were found in the range of −6.6118 to −4.0372 kcal/mol. Highest activity was shown by bis(2-ethylhexyl) phthalate ( O in Figure 3).
